buildingblocks.name: Specification
buildingblocks.summary: The root specification for the API definition format, providing a base set of rules for all services and tools that employ the spec.
buildingblocks.details: The root specification for the API definition format, providing a base set of rules for all services and tools that employ the spec.

buildingblocks.name: Generator
buildingblocks.summary: Generating an API definition format from an existing system or platform.
buildingblocks.details: Generating an API definition format from an existing system or platform.

buildingblocks.name: Parser
buildingblocks.summary: Parses a machine readable API definition and makes ready for use in specific language, structure, or platform.
buildingblocks.details: Parses a machine readable API definition and makes ready for use in specific language, structure, or platform.

buildingblocks.name: Validator
buildingblocks.summary: Validates an API definition against its formal specification and schema, producing a valid or invalid response, with as much detail as possible.
buildingblocks.details: Validates an API definition against its formal specification and schema, producing a valid or invalid response, with as much detail as possible.

buildingblocks.name: Schema
buildingblocks.summary: Produces a specific schema, from an existing template, in a particular API definition format.
buildingblocks.details: Produces a specific schema, from an existing template, in a particular API definition format.

buildingblocks.name: Converter
buildingblocks.summary: The conversion of an API definition from one format into another.
buildingblocks.details: The conversion of an API definition from one format into another.

buildingblocks.name: Database
buildingblocks.summary: Tooling that generates an API definition format from a database connection, allowing for API integration with common database formats.
buildingblocks.details: Tooling that generates an API definition format from a database connection, allowing for API integration with common database formats.

buildingblocks.name: Mock
buildingblocks.summary: Generating a mock interface for an API based upon the definition provided, allowing for testing, and playing with a copy of the API that is not for production.
buildingblocks.details: Generating a mock interface for an API based upon the definition provided, allowing for testing, and playing with a copy of the API that is not for production.

buildingblocks.name: Server
buildingblocks.summary: The auto generation of server side code from a machine readable API definition.
buildingblocks.details: The auto generation of server side code from a machine readable API definition.

buildingblocks.name: Client
buildingblocks.summary: The auto generation of client side code from a machine readable API definition format.
buildingblocks.details: The auto generation of client side code from a machine readable API definition format.

buildingblocks.name: Single Page Application
buildingblocks.summary: Generating a single page applicaiton in a specific framework, derieved from an API definition, either as documentation for API, or as functional app interactive with API itself.
buildingblocks.details: Generating a single page applicaiton in a specific framework, derieved from an API definition, either as documentation for API, or as functional app interactive with API itself.

buildingblocks.name: Command-Line
buildingblocks.summary: The usage of machine readable API definitions at the command line.
buildingblocks.details: The usage of machine readable API definitions at the command line.

buildingblocks.name: Powershell
buildingblocks.summary: The usage of machine readable API definitions via the powershell interface.
buildingblocks.details: The usage of machine readable API definitions via the powershell interface.

buildingblocks.name: Testing
buildingblocks.summary: Generating, providing, and configuring API testing using machine readable API definition formats.
buildingblocks.details: Generating, providing, and configuring API testing using machine readable API definition formats.

buildingblocks.name: Monitoring
buildingblocks.summary: Setting up of API monitors to keep track of API operations over scheduled period of time using an API definition format.
buildingblocks.details: Setting up of API monitors to keep track of API operations over scheduled period of time using an API definition format.

buildingblocks.name: Proxy
buildingblocks.summary: Generation and configuration of a proxy from a machine readable API definition.
buildingblocks.details: Generation and configuration of a proxy from a machine readable API definition.

buildingblocks.name: Aggregator
buildingblocks.summary: Aggregation of APIs using a machine readable API definition format.
buildingblocks.details: Aggregation of APIs using a machine readable API definition format.

buildingblocks.name: Editors
buildingblocks.summary: API definition editor, allowing for the creation, import, and export of API definition formats, providing a simple, IDE like API editing experience.
buildingblocks.details: API definition editor, allowing for the creation, import, and export of API definition formats, providing a simple, IDE like API editing experience.

buildingblocks.name: Documentation
buildingblocks.summary: Generation of static, or JavaScript interactive documentation from the API definition, helping developers understand what an API does.
buildingblocks.details: Generation of static, or JavaScript interactive documentation from the API definition, helping developers understand what an API does.

buildingblocks.name: IDE Plugin
buildingblocks.summary: Providng integration with existing integrated development environments (IDE), giving developers API discovery, documentation, and integration tooling right in the IDE.
buildingblocks.details: Providng integration with existing integrated development environments (IDE), giving developers API discovery, documentation, and integration tooling right in the IDE.

buildingblocks.name: Forms
buildingblocks.summary: Dynamically generating an HTML form from an API definition, allow for the structure, and handling to be driven by an API definition.
buildingblocks.details: Dynamically generating an HTML form from an API definition, allow for the structure, and handling to be driven by an API definition.

buildingblocks.name: Real-Time
buildingblocks.summary: Establishing a connection with real-time functionality derived from an API definition format, allowing APIs to be connected with other real-time protocols.
buildingblocks.details: Establishing a connection with real-time functionality derived from an API definition format, allowing APIs to be connected with other real-time protocols.

buildingblocks.name: Visualization
buildingblocks.summary: Generating a visualization from the meta data, or resources made available via a machine readable API definition.
buildingblocks.details: Generating a visualization from the meta data, or resources made available via a machine readable API definition.
